classicMode.title: Classic Block Puzzle
classicMode.description: Match and clear colored blocks in our addictive Classic mode. Place blocks strategically to clear lines and rack up high scores!

adventureMode.title: Block Adventure Mode
adventureMode.description: Explore tropical rainforests, meet cute animals, and collect fun rewards while solving exciting block puzzles!

challenges.title: Daily Challenges
challenges.description: Test your skills with new puzzles every day. Complete challenges to earn special rewards and climb the leaderboards!

offlinePlay.title: Play Anywhere
offlinePlay.description: No WiFi? No problem! Block Blast works offline, so you can enjoy puzzle fun anytime, anywhere!

community.title: Join the Fun
community.description: Connect with millions of Block Blast players worldwide. Share strategies, compete for high scores, and make new friends!

mainImage.alt: Block Blast Gameplay Screenshot - Match and Clear Blocks

howItWorks.title: How to Play Block Blast
howItWorks.description: Ready to start your Block Blast adventure? It's super easy! Just follow these simple steps and you'll be matching blocks like a pro in no time!

step1.title: Start the Game
step1.description: Visit blockblastgame.net and click 'Play Now' to jump right into Block Blast fun! No downloads needed - just click and play!

step2.title: Match Blocks
step2.description: See those colorful blocks? Click on groups of 2 or more matching blocks to clear them. The more blocks you match, the more points you get!

step3.title: Score Big
step3.description: Keep clearing blocks to rack up points! Try to clear multiple rows or columns at once for awesome combo bonuses in Block Blast!

step4.title: Beat Challenges
step4.description: Ready for more? Try our special Block Blast modes! Adventure mode, daily challenges, and more ways to test your skills await!

gameTips.title: Block Blast Pro Tips
gameTips.description: Want to become a Block Blast master? Check out these super helpful tips that will boost your game!

strategy.title: Think Smart
strategy.description: In Block Blast, planning ahead is key! Look at all your blocks and think about where they'll fit best. Try to keep the board clear and avoid getting stuck!

planning.title: Clear Space
planning.description: Don't let blocks pile up in Block Blast! Always try to clear full rows or columns when you can. The more space you have, the easier it is to play!

combo.title: Make Combos
combo.description: Want to get high scores in Block Blast? Clear multiple rows or columns at once! Combos give you extra points and make the game super fun!

timing.title: Take Your Time
timing.description: Block Blast isn't a race! Take your time to think about each move. There's no time limit, so you can play at your own pace and make smart choices!

practice.title: Keep Playing
practice.description: The more you play Block Blast, the better you'll get! Try different game modes, challenge yourself, and have fun while improving your skills!

faq.mainTitle: Block Blast FAQ - Your Questions Answered
faq.description: Got questions about Block Blast? We've got all the answers you need right here!

whatIs.question: What is Block Blast?
whatIs.answer: Block Blast is a super fun puzzle game where you match and clear colorful blocks! It's free to play right in your web browser at blockblastgame.net. Perfect for quick fun or long gaming sessions, Block Blast helps you relax while giving your brain a fun workout!

howToPlay.question: How do I play Block Blast?
howToPlay.answer: Playing Block Blast is easy! Just click on groups of 2 or more matching blocks to clear them. The more blocks you clear at once, the more points you get! Try to keep the blocks from reaching the top of the screen. You can play different modes like Classic Mode or Adventure Mode for extra fun!

gameModes.question: What game modes are in Block Blast?
gameModes.answer: Block Blast has two awesome modes: Classic Mode, where you match blocks to score points, and Adventure Mode, where you explore cool places, meet cute animals, and solve fun puzzles! Both modes are totally free to play!

offline.question: Can I play Block Blast without internet?
offline.answer: Yes! One of the best things about Block Blast is that you can play it offline. Once you've loaded the game, you can keep playing even without WiFi or internet connection. Perfect for playing on the go!

highScore.question: How do I get high scores in Block Blast?
highScore.answer: To get high scores in Block Blast, try to clear multiple rows or columns at once for bonus points! Plan ahead, look for big block matches, and try to keep the board clear. The more you practice, the better you'll get at spotting great moves!

rewards.question: Are there any rewards in Block Blast?
rewards.answer: Yes! Block Blast has lots of fun rewards. You can earn points, unlock new levels in Adventure Mode, and get special items. Play daily to collect more rewards and challenge yourself to beat your high scores!

social.question: Can I play Block Blast with friends?
social.answer: While Block Blast is a single-player game, you can still have fun with friends! Compare high scores, share strategies, and challenge each other to beat your best scores. Follow us on social media to join the Block Blast community!

faq.needHelp: Still have questions about Block Blast?

testimonials.title: What Players Love About Block Blast
testimonials.subtitle: Join millions of happy players who can't stop playing Block Blast! Here's what they're saying about their favorite puzzle game.

player1.content: Block Blast is my go-to game for quick fun! I love how I can play it anywhere, even without internet. The colorful blocks and smooth gameplay make it super addictive!
player1.name: Emma S.

player2.content: I've tried many block puzzle games, but Block Blast is the best! The Adventure Mode is so much fun, and I love collecting rewards while solving puzzles.
player2.name: Tom L.

player3.content: My kids and I play Block Blast together every day. It's perfect for family game time - easy to learn but challenging to master. The daily challenges keep us coming back!
player3.name: Maria R.

player4.content: Block Blast helps me relax after work. The combo system is so satisfying, and I love trying to beat my high scores. It's the perfect brain training game!
player4.name: David K.

player5.content: As a puzzle game fan, I'm impressed by Block Blast's smooth gameplay and fun features. The offline mode is perfect for my commute, and I never get bored!
player5.name: Sophie M.

player6.content: Block Blast is amazing! I started playing last month and can't put it down. The classic mode is simple but super fun, and the graphics are beautiful!
player6.name: Alex P.

Bomb Blocks clear everything around them

footer.description: Block Blast - The ultimate free puzzle game where strategy meets fun! Join millions of players worldwide in this addictive block-matching adventure.

blockBlastSolver.title: Block Blast Solver Instructions
blockBlastSolver.description: This is a tool to help you find the optimal solution in Block Blast game. Follow these steps:

steps.step1: Click or drag mouse to set initial blocks on the main board (shown in green)
steps.step2: Design your Figure shapes in the three small grids below (distinguished by red, yellow, and blue)
steps.step3: Click "Calculate Optimal Solution" to see placement suggestions

gameRules.title: Game Rules Tips:
rules: When 8 cells in the same row or column are filled, they will be automatically cleared
After clearing, other blocks remain in place (no gravity effect)
Three Figures can be placed in any order

interactions.clickOrDrag: Click or drag to set initial blocks
interactions.noValidPlacement: Current layout cannot place any Figure, please try another layout
interactions.continueDesigning: You can continue designing new Figures for the next round

introduction.title: Block Blast - Free Online Block Blast Puzzle Game

Match colorful blocks, create amazing combinations, and experience endless puzzle fun right in your browser. No downloads required - start playing instantly and join millions of players worldwide!
highlights: Free to play - no registration needed
